remarks: Two alternate formulations of a subspace topology of a metric space topology.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 19-Aug-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2014.)
statement:
metrest.1 $e |- D = ( C |` ( Y X. Y ) ) $.
metrest.3 $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` C ) $.
metrest.4 $e |- K = ( MetOpen ` D ) $.
metrest $p |- ( ( C e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ Y C_ X ) -> ( J |`t Y ) = K ) $.
